name: Holly

topics.response_text: I don't think we've been properly introduced. I'm Holly... Vance's wife.

topics.topic_text: Come on, all I want to do is talk. What harm could little old me do?
topics.response_text: Well, I guess so. You seem like a pretty nice guy.

topics.topic_text: Hey, I'm just here to help. All I want to do is be someone he can talk to.
topics.response_text: Well, I guess so. You seem like a pretty nice guy.

topics.topic_text: Maybe it will, or maybe it's just messing him up more.
topics.response_text: You don't think he's already messed up? Come on. Don't kid yourself.

topics.topic_text: Sorry, I think he needs to be with his real family.
topics.response_text: You just don't get it, do you? We are his "real" family, okay?

topics.topic_text: Please, help me understand your Laws.
topics.response_text: Each of us is required to speak one of the Laws when we hold our ceremonies. I say the First Law.

topics.topic_text: I'm looking for Ian West. Have you seen him?
topics.response_text: I'm afraid Vance has him in isolation and there is no way I'm going to override Vance's orders.
This is Meresti, the home of the Family. It's the only safe place for these poor people.
My husband started this group not long ago. He was trying to save them from a life of hardship and ridicule.

conversation.response_text: It was good talking to you.
Yep. We're both extremely proud of you. You've come such a long way in a short amount of time.
Oh come now, Vance. You are doing what's best for these people. If it wasn't for you, they'd be living in the Wastes... or dead.

description:
Holly is a 55 year-old Caucasian Female.

Holly is the wife of Vance and the oldest female member of The Family in 2277. She has several reservations about her husband's beliefs but supports him completely. As a veteran member of the group, she is strong-willed, intelligent, and respected by the other Family members.

Holly's Personality: Strong-willed and intelligent, yet supportive of her husband despite her reservations about his beliefs. She is loyal and has earned the respect of other Family members through her long-standing commitment to the group.

Holly's Backstory: Holly was one of the first people to join Vance when he decided to exile himself to the Meresti Metro station, becoming the founding member of The Family. Over the years, she has grown fond of Vance and they have developed a healthy relationship. As the oldest female member and a veteran of the group, she holds a position of respect among the other Family members who accept her relationship with Vance without suspicion.
